meanings.sent1: From the housetops, you can see the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The birds chirped happily on the housetops.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the housetops were her personal playground.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight bathed the housetops in a silvery glow.
meanings.sent5: Children love to play hide-and-seek on the housetops.

meanings.definition: The uppermost part of a building.
meanings.sent1: Santa Claus is often depicted flying over the housetops.
meanings.sent2: Rainwater cascaded down the housetops during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons held a meeting on the housetops, discussing their next move.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked over the housetops, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The city skyline was dotted with housetops as far as the eye could see.
